name: Guardian Angel 100% Sterling Silver
description:
Lustrous and substantial Sterling Silver pendant.  This is based on an original Art Deco design from the 1930's.  The Guardian Angel is our most popular piece and it looks beautiful with anything on anyone.

A must for any rider and a PERFECT gift for the cyclist in your life (or yourself...)


Approximately 3/4" x 1"

name: Fixed Gear 100% Sterling Silver
description:
Fixey or single speed lovers delight.  This piece, based on a 1920's original is our most stylish.   Beautifully cast in solid Sterling Silver this does not disappoint.  A fantastic gift for the rider in your life.


Approximately 1"x 1 1/4"

name: Ciclismo signature 100% Sterling Silver
description:
This piece is about pure cycling fanaticism.  The rider is tense, taut and focused.  The ride is what it's all about!  Based on an early 1900's original this piece is gorgeously cast in thick & solid Sterling Silver.

Size is approximately 7/8" x 1 1/4"

name: The Race is on 100% Sterling Silver
description:
Beautiful, large pendant for roadies.  This is based on a 1920's original and shows an amazing level of detail.  All of our pieces are wearable art but this one shows the highest level of skill in it's original sculptor. 

A brilliant present for a racer or cyclist who appreciates attention to detail. 

Piece is approximately 1" x 1 1/4"

name: Live to ride 100% Sterling Silver
description:
This is our smallest pendant and is also very versatile and among the heaviest in terms of Sterling weight.  it simply shows a love of the ride and works for cyclists of all stripes.  Whether you ride fixed steel or 30 speed carbon this piece fits the bill.  The original is a 1920's design and the small size makes it a sweet, discreet reminder of your passion for the road.

Size is approximately 3/4" x 1"
